stimulusHtml: Assuming a banking system with limited reserves, which of the following will most likely happen if a countryâ€™s government decreases its spending and the central bank increases the money supply?
choicesHtml: An increase in unemployment and an appreciation of the currency
An increase in interest rates and a decrease in aggregate supply
A decrease in interest rates and an increase in investment spending
A depreciation of the currency and an increase in imports
An increase in aggregate demand and unemployment
